power.thermoo-patches.cold_immune.name: Freezing Immunity

power.thermoo-patches.extra_heat_resista: You are more resistant to high temperatures.
power.thermoo-patches.heat_immune.name: Heating Immunity
power.thermoo-patches.heat_immune.descri: You are immune to warm temperatures.
power.thermoo-patches.heat_benefit.name: Thermophilia
power.thermoo-patches.heat_vulnerability: You are warmed much faster than humans.
